Container.Name: domoticz
Container.Overview: Domoticz is a very light weight home automation system that lets you monitor and configure miscellaneous devices, including lights, switches, various sensors/meters like temperature, rainfall, wind, ultraviolet (UV) radiation, electricity usage/production, gas consumption, water consumption and many more. Notifications/alerts can be sent to any mobile device.
Container.Description:
Domoticz is a very light weight home automation system that lets you monitor and configure miscellaneous devices, including lights, switches, various sensors/meters like temperature, rainfall, wind, ultraviolet (UV) radiation, electricity usage/production, gas consumption, water consumption and many more. Notifications/alerts can be sent to any mobile device.
Best of all, Domoticz is open source and completely free! You only need to invest in hardware.[br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br]
[b]/config[/b] : Storing all domoticz config files [br]
[b]8080[/b] : The web-interface. [br]
